settings.heading: Treat your senses to the sweet aroma, the spiced flavour and the warm textures of a Mulled Beverage. Experience this delicious drink with friends or family today.
settings.step_description_1: ADD the spiced bag into a mug
settings.step_description_2: POUR in your choice of beverage
settings.step_description_3: HEAT in the microwave for 60 seconds, or heat on the stove for 4-5 minutes
